content: join the divine debris newsletter so you never miss a free pattern release 1 > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** what s better than one crochet basket two of course it s even better when they match and with the berry stitch baskets you get a matching but not quite the same set of baskets that offer two sizes of squishy storage for new wips obviously and look cute doing it both baskets are worked in the round from the bottom up and feature easy two color blocking and texture in the simple berry stitch while it s not quite a bobble the berry stitch is an easy way to get some fun texture in any project but don t forget to tug those berry stitches to the right side of the basket to maximize their wow factor the sample for this basket was made with hue + me yarn from lion brand 3 and this pattern is available in a kit 4 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2023 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns
